name: eupatorium maculatum
description: A Butterfly Magnet, Joe Pye Weed grows up to 6' tall and is crowned with clusters of bright pink flowers in late summer. Perfect for planting in damp soil in marshy areas, along streambanks, and on pond edges, Eupatorium maculatum will also thrive in rich garden soil. If you're looking for a Joe Pye to plant in a shady location, try Sweet Joe Pye Weed.Other names include Spotted Joe Pye Weed and Eutrochium maculatum.
